author: Jibril Pribadi
comment: I really love the theme, but I think I found  a bug in messaging (SMS) application. The font in message conversatioj which i send is in white color, when the background is white too. I hardly can't see what I texting before. Is that bug or maybe there's something I don't know about setting appearance? It's Lil anoyyed me, but you do a great job with this theme
title: Its really good, but..

author: Ben Sentry
comment: Mostly excellent. Nice use of colours and flat textures. The in call dialer UI is buggy for me. It has broken, overlayed graphics. Everything else I'd working great. Ticks every box in CM theme selector which is impressive, especially with a free theme. I'm using it with Flat Style xposed module to get the matching coloured status bar. Awesome stuff. Update with optional, dark UI elements is great.

reply.author: MinDesigns
reply.content: There are 4 versions of IdeaL Themes, try them, and stay with the one you like the most. :)

title: Very good

author: Will Wu
comment: This is a great theme for those who want a Lollipop inspired theme. I'm using this with parts of Blurred UI and they conflict a tiny bit, but they work fine with each other. I dislike the opaque Quick Tile background and would rather have it be transparent. The notifications for Gmail could also look better as right now it just looks as if it was shoehorned in there. Overall, app was nice but of course there can be improvements. Hope to see updates.
title: Great theme

author: Nishanta Halder
comment: This is no doubt one of the best lollipop theme out there in the market for free and better than many other paid themes. Just one thing. THERE IS NO GRADIENT IN THE NOTIFICATION PANEL IN ORIGINAL ANDROID LOLLIPOP. TRY TO FIX THAT. I love perfection.
title: One of my favourite

author: Rohit Bodalikar
comment: Best theme I've used on my OPO so far! Slightly bothered by the non receding on screen capacitive buttons when I play a game or something. But other than that really stable!   EDIT: After using this app for a couple of hours now I'd like to make a new statement. I'm not going to tell you it though because you should be downloading this app, get it already it's awesome.
title: Great app!

author: Peter Osamor
comment: Unlike the normal holo/cm 11 theme, this makes my phone overheat like crazy! Too bad it looks amazing. I'll rate 5  stars if you could somehow fix this. (Used on an HTC desire 510)
title: Feels like fire! 🔥

author: Anders Pedersen
comment: When I try to launch the Play Store while the Style option from this theme is turned on, Play Store will crash. I can turn any other option on and it works fine, but not Style.  If I try to launch Play Store and let it crash 3 times in a row, my phone will automatically turn everything from the default Holo theme on.  Otherwise, this theme is great. But annoying that I can't use the Play Store :S
title: Play Store crashes when I turn theme on

author: Santosh Meena
comment: The theme is good but some things like the arrows in Cyanogenmod protected apps screen get invisible, also the play button for ringtones in Themes Showcase go invisible and apps like cLock from Cyanogenmod go invisible in the apps menu. And icons which are already Material Design like the Google app and Google Music App, Google calendar, Play games, Play Store, YouTube app, should be left alone add they're already too good already and your version of the icons are not too good. The theme is good otherwise.
title: It's Good But Some Things Get Invisible and Some Icons…

author: manoj kumar
comment: I can't see the msgs which I send is merging with background color... Pls fix this..Already many mentioned Abt this..if it is fixed..it s top rated theme without doubt.
title: Excellent, but one issue spoiling overall

author: Tam OOr
comment: I have Google  samsung galaxy nexus 3 with CM11 latest nightly rom every thing is working seems to be very very good nice theme but boot logo is very large pixel which my fone is not sported so please fix it for my fone. It shows black screen until fone gets on start up
title: Very good theme but boot logo?

comment: The soft keys or known as the nav bar, glitches out. When you play games or watch video the soft keys become useless, making you get stuck on that app. Maybe it's just on my device but nevertheless it's still there.
title: Issues with the soft keys

comment: This theme is wonderful.. Just a small thing.. Sent messages has a white font. Which make them hidden.. Pls add this point in next update... And if possible kindly bring some more interactive changes..
title: Nice..

author: Kalpesh Patel
comment: After every nightly update it gives an error 'failed to install..' And I have to download and reinstall it all over again. Please fix it.
title: Superb theme.. But one Error!

author: Deepak Mer
comment: Using this theme constantly on my CM-11 powered MOTO E.. Very beautiful theme.. Sometimes system-ui crashed.. If we jump over to wifi in settings, then also settings section stops to work and crashed.. Overall good theme.. Must have theme for CM-11 users..
title: Love it..

author: Orlando Ferreras
comment: It's the best CM theme that I've seen and used. Simple, clean, beautiful, smooth. My LG G2 rocks all of rules now. Thank you very much, keep the great job. 😎
title: I just say "woooooow"

author: Sehajpreet Singh
comment: For most parts, it's good..... Few icons look bad... For example that ES explorer icon and Dialer icon.... Also , the dialer icon in dock is waaay oversized
title: Good . Need little more work

author: Elbrie de Kock
comment: Great theme,  simple,  easy to read font,  fresh colours....  But I can't see the msg I sent?! Their text colour is white on a white background.
title: Love it bar one thing

author: Sumitro Bhaumik
comment: The loading circle is not a perfect circle. Please correct that. It's the only that strikes me. Because rest of your theme elements are pixel perfect. And this loading icon is same for the rest of your themes. Otherwise fabulous theme.
title: 4.9 rating because...

author: Dave Augood
comment: Good theme, but there is a small issue where any text message that I send doesn't show on my device, although they go through fine to my recipients. I have tried other themes and they work perfectly, fix thus one issue and I'll give 5 stars.
title: Good, but

author: Jason Liang
comment: Words can't describe how amazing this theme is! This is the best material design theme in my opinion. Download it right now! You won't be disappointed.
title: The only theme you'll ever need

author: DEN Nimus
comment: Everything went just good..  But suddenly i went to Wi-Fi setting and then stop working
title: Setting stop working

author: Paniagua Family
comment: I can't get enough of this theme! When I updated to 5.0 it became unstable, but if you don't install "notifications, wallpapers, lock wallpapers, and ringtones" you're good.
title: Amazing.

author: Victor Faleiro
comment: Awesome theme! The "Ideal Themes family" is arguably the best collection of themes you can ever find. Thanks for that. The only issue is that it's not compatible with Lollipop or newer.

author: Антонио Ивановски
comment: Update: instaled thr Light version and it fixed my black dialer, now it is white. Thank you!                                                          I have tried some paid ones, free ones and so far this is the best. I am not a big fan of the dialer with the black background, if the developer could fix that it would be amazin
title: Best Lollipop theme

author: Krishna Malhotra
comment: Just perfect but one thing with the nav bar buttons it glitches out while running full screen games and videos please fix.
title: Nav bar buttons glitch

author: Freddie Begelhole
comment: Its deletes all my email accounts gmail and hot mail on nexus 4 with cyanogenmod 11 nightly please fix
title: Good but annoying

author: Ganoes Paran
comment: Its good in some areas whereas others look absolutely outrageous. The themed keyboard is the most retarded I've ever seen.
title: Pretty good in some areas

author: Syed Askar
comment: Almost perfect theme, the only problem is sometimes sent items messages fonts in messaging turns into white which makes hard to read with white background. Fix it!
title: Almost perfect

author: Zuhairi Zainudin
comment: Perfect theme! For those of you that have problem with SMS app just use Google messenger app.
title: Perfecto!

author: Stefano Phillips
comment: I can't see what I sent in messages....sent messages font is the some color as the background please fix! Before I can recommended to others
title: One issue

author: JoliJimi Trex
comment: Great! Some icons look way too simplistic, like the minecraft logo but meh...
title: Wowowowow

author: emidio granito
comment: When I go to WiFi settings it crashes. I'm using a OnePlus One with CM11
title: Very cool, but..

author: Sarath Sarma
comment: I can't see the messages which I have sent...Except that all are nice
title: Messaging Problem

author: ViNaY VK
comment: Just brings material design to your eyes, loved it n I have used almost all lollipop themes even paid n I can tell u this theme is better than those which are paid, thank you dev for making this wonderful theme n making it free. Tinted_Status bar + Ideal l = android l
title: Awesome

author: Jonathan Alexander
comment: Great theme, but i only use its font and boot animation since there is a bug (or not) in my 1080p 16:9 screen LG Optimus G Pro CM11 M12. There is a space remain on the left and right side of the screen when notification drawer expanded.
title: Superb. What font that this theme are using?

author: Manthan Mallikarjun
comment: It looks beautiful! Only bad thing I see is that the Spotify icon looks weird.
title: Amazing theme

author: Mateja Malinovic
comment: This is coming from a guy that has tried a bunch of material design themes and i was fascinated with the look of your theme, you nailed the buttons, nailed the notification panel, quick setting, settings, I'm just so surprised. Keep it up, and if you ask me, just change the recent apps screen, less is sometimes more.
title: Great job!

author: ROHIT Sonone
comment: First of all it's free and still it would beat lot of paid ones for extent of customized material look it follows.
title: Best material design theme

author: Jared Letuce
comment: How to change the letter color on its keyboard? I really cant see it bcause it is white :(
title: Good But ...

author: Can SARIGÜL
comment: Does not support Turkish chars and after installing cannot open WiFi l, setting occurs error. Change to default theme to fix WiFi problem.
title: Language + Wi-Fi poblem
